thread.title: Tensions soar after Gaza rocket lands in Israel PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Tensions soar after Gaza rocket lands in Israel | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Tensions soar after Gaza rocket lands in Israel PBS NewsHour
text: Violence continued to escalate between Palestinian militants and the Israeli military after a rocket was allegedly fired from the Gaza Strip into southern Israel over the weekend. Josef Federman of The Associated Press joins Hari Sreenivasan via Skype from Jerusalem, to discuss the mounting unrest.
